name: Happytails
body:
### Happytails   :dog:Pet Services for Capitol Hill:cat:
Hi! :octocat: I'm Ana, currently the sole proprietor of Happy Tails Pet Services. We provide a variety of pet-centric services that include :

* Walking

* Light Grooming

* Playdates (*)

* Adventures (*)

      (*) By Appointment.

*I also do light gardening, pruning, weeding and landscaping.


### Community Oriented
I've lived in the Capitol Hill area for nearly 15 years and know all the best parks and trails in our collective neighborhoods.

HappyTrails is also a [Capitol Hill Community](https://happytails.github.io) member. In short CHC members loosely adhere to some pragmatic, self sustaining business practices that work as partial antithesis to the gentrification occurring on the hill. 

*You can learn more about CHC here: [Capitol Hill Community](https://happytails.github.io) 

### Contact Me
* * email (ana@indoctrinate.us)

* * phone (206.867.5309 email for real number)

### Billing
### We Currently Accept:

*  Paypal

*  Bitcoin

*  Credit 







#####powered by [Capitol Hill Community](https://happytails.github.io)
